title: Online Shopping
description: This chapter explores the benefits and risks of online shopping, teaches strategies to protect personal information, and helps students develop skills to make smart purchasing decisions in the digital marketplace.
learning_objectives: Understand the benefits and risks of online shopping
Learn how to protect personal information and avoid fraud when shopping online
Develop strategies for making informed purchasing decisions
Compare online vs. in-store purchasing options
Identify security features that indicate safe online transactions
Create a personalized plan for making smart online purchases
